title: Jets Coach Promises No Tanking In Game Against Equally Awful Titans
teaser: When a season is lost, some teams will take it easy their last few games — or the last 82, if it's the Philadelphia 76ers — in hopes of securing a better draft pick. But not this NFL cellar-dweller.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
